name: Memcached Keystone Token and Session Cache
description: In-memory Keystone token cache and session data within the Memcached cluster. Stores active authentication tokens, session state, and catalog cache entries for all OpenStack API consumers. Data is ephemeral (lost on restart) but highly sensitive during runtime — tokens provide full API access to cloud resources. Currently operates WITHOUT authentication and WITHOUT TLS encryption on the wire.

backup_status.retention_period: Ephemeral — data lost on process restart

access_control_model: NONE — Memcached has no built-in authentication. Any process with network access to the Memcached port can read/write all cached tokens.

lineage_upstream.description: Validated tokens cached from Keystone authentication

temporal.change_reason: KG enrichment — Phase 1 entity completion; CRITICAL security gap flagged

provenance.primary_data_source: Genestack Memcached deployment + OpenStack Keystone caching documentation

known_data_gaps.gap_description: Memcached stores Keystone tokens in cleartext in memory with no authentication. Any pod with network access to Memcached can read all active tokens. Combined with no TLS, tokens traverse the network in cleartext.
known_data_gaps.remediation_plan: IMMEDIATE: Enable SASL authentication on Memcached. Enable TLS for all Memcached connections. Consider migration to Redis with TLS+AUTH as a more security-capable caching layer.

known_data_gaps.gap_description: No authentication mechanism — any network-reachable process has full read/write access
known_data_gaps.remediation_plan: Implement SASL authentication and network segmentation to restrict Memcached access to Keystone pods only

name: RabbitMQ OpenStack Message Queue Data

Carries AMQP messages containing API calls between Nova, Neutron, Cinder, Heat, Ironic, and other services including compute instance lifecycle events, network provisioning commands, volume attach/detach operations, and orchestration callbacks. Messages are transient but may contain sensitive payloads including credentials passed between services, instance metadata, and security group rules. Critical path for all cloud control plane operations.

name: Kubernetes etcd Cluster State Store
description: etcd key-value store containing the complete state of all Genestack Kubernetes clusters. Stores every Kubernetes object: pods, services, deployments, secrets, configmaps, namespaces, RBAC policies, CRDs, and custom resources. Contains plaintext Kubernetes Secrets (unless etcd encryption-at-rest is enabled) including database passwords, TLS private keys, API tokens, and service account credentials for all OpenStack services. The single source of truth for the entire container orchestration layer — loss of etcd means loss of the entire cluster state.
access_control_model: mTLS client certificates — only kube-apiserver connects to etcd; peer-to-peer mTLS for Raft replication

lineage_downstream.description: TLS secrets stored as K8s Secrets in etcd
Workflow CRD state persisted in etcd

breach_notification_obligation.jurisdiction: US Federal / EU (GDPR) — contains credentials for regulated systems

temporal.change_reason: KG enrichment — Phase 1 entity completion; CRITICAL encryption gap flagged

provenance.primary_data_source: Kubernetes architecture documentation + Genestack deployment patterns

known_data_gaps.gap_description: etcd encryption-at-rest status unconfirmed. If disabled, ALL Kubernetes Secrets (database passwords, TLS keys, API tokens) are stored in cleartext in etcd. This is the single highest-impact encryption gap in the entire infrastructure.
known_data_gaps.remediation_plan: IMMEDIATE: Verify etcd encryption configuration via EncryptionConfiguration resource; if disabled, enable aescbc or aesgcm provider for secrets, configmaps at minimum

known_data_gaps.gap_description: etcd snapshot backup schedule, tested restore procedures, and off-site backup storage unconfirmed. Loss of etcd without backup means complete cluster rebuild.
known_data_gaps.remediation_plan: Verify automated etcd snapshot schedule; test full cluster restore from snapshot; ensure off-site backup storage

known_data_gaps.gap_description: etcd data directory size unknown — critical for performance tuning and compaction
